title: STOLEN LIVES
description: Stolen Lives is a tale of three people caught in a dangerous web of love, betrayal and revenge in Chicago's Prohibition era. The novella follows the life of John "Mad Dog" Michaels, a leading North-Side racketeer. Mary Lawson, his mistress, will stop at nothing to become a star. Born in poverty, she agrees to be loyal to Michaels, after he promises her stardom. Willie Krieg, his bodyguard, tries to help Mary get out of this destructive world, risking his own life at the cost of betraying his boss.  Stolen Lives shows us that, in any society, past or present, you pay for who you are.
author: Mary Ellen Lisciandra
